meanings.definition: With the mouth open in surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: She stared openmouthed at the magician's disappearing act.
meanings.sent2: The child looked openmouthed at the colorful fireworks in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The puppy sat openmouthed as the bubbles floated around its head.
meanings.sent4: The audience was openmouthed as the acrobat performed daring stunts.
meanings.sent5: Her openmouthed expression showed her amazement at the beautiful sunset.

meanings.sent1: The lioness had an openmouthed expression while roaring.
meanings.sent2: The cartoon character had an openmouthed smile in every scene.
meanings.sent3: The openmouthed fish looked surprised as it swam in circles.
meanings.sent4: The openmouthed statue seemed frozen in a perpetual gasp.
meanings.sent5: The openmouthed baby bird eagerly awaited its next meal.
